item.title: Party room deposit help
item.dc:creator: @yesimanub yesimanub
item.description:
@yesimanub wrote:

So i have made a real party room along with working ballons

but im stuck on making rares and untradeable unable to be droped…
any help?
here’s my deposit code

public static void depositItem(Client c, int id, int amount){ int slot = arraySlot(c.party, id); if(c.getItems().getItemAmount(id) < amount){ amount = c.getItems().getItemAmount(id); } if(!c.getItems().playerHasItem(id, amount)){ c.sendMessage("Sorry, but you do not have that many items."); return; } if(slot == -1){ c.sendMessage("Sorry ! No more than 8 items at once !"); return; } c.getItems().deleteItem2(id, amount); if(c.party[slot] != id){ c.party[slot] = id; c.partyN[slot] = amount; }else{ c.party[slot] = id; c.partyN[slot] += amount; } updateDeposit(c); }

EDIT: GOING TO TRY AND USE THE CODE FROM CONFIG AND SEE IF WORKS

Read full topic
